products.title: Wow Factor Brushed Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and discreet, the wow factor in brushed oyster is a classic brushed gold that combines class and subtlety. Crafted from durable, heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easy to tilt and move about, this is a blind that is built to last - in quality and style. For subdued glamour, use with dark navy blues, deep purples, or rich burgundys, accenting occasionally with pretty creams. These would all make flexible colour schemes, perfect in many rooms, including the living room, dining room, and master bedroom.

products.title: Wow Factor Gunmetal Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: Slate grey works effortlessly with a gentle shimmer to create the pretty but utilitarian window covering that is the wow factor in gunmetal star. By blending a high quality, heavy gauge aluminium metal with simple pull-cords to control the light, this blind offers a durable and long-lasting window covering that will retain its quality and style. Hang the gunmetal star in a contemporary dining room, accented by bright silvers, or use in a teenager's room for a fun and exciting shimmering window covering, sat amongst soft greys and dulled whites.

products.title: Wow Factor Silver Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: A pretty, shimmering blind, patterned with a soft glitter, the wow factor in silver star is soft and unobtrusive. The heavy-duty aluminium slats can be adjusted to allow just the right amount of light into the room, all controlled by easy-to-use pull-cords. Pretty pink bedrooms with a light and romantic feel will benefit from the silver star, which will glisten beautifully amongst white walls and hushed rose hues.

products.title: Roma Bahia - Vertical Blind
products.description: Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please. Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

products.title: Roma Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Roma Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.description: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

products.title: Roma Dawn - Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.

products.title: Roma Alto - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Contrast against chocolate and mocha browns in the living room, highlighted by gold metallics, for a comfortable colour scheme to relax and unwind in. Or go a little bolder and use the alto to accent deep plum walls, with white and beige accents to complete the look.

products.title: Roma Scorpion - Vertical Blind
products.description: What better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabric as well as chic and panache. The scorpion's cool neutrality works wonderfully as part of the uber-stylish colour scheme of yellow and grey, which can be fashionably complemented with fun chevron patterns and daring stripes.

products.title: Roma Snuff - Vertical Blind
products.description: Combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or take centre stage as the feature colour. Blend with deep aubergine purple for a bold, unapologetic look in the master bedroom, combining style and chic with romance and atmosphere; or have it sitting pretty in your downstairs hallway against soft cream walls and the palest of lilacs.

products.title: Roma Lime - Vertical Blind
products.description: Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed. Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

products.title: Roma Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.description: Light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add sanctuary to your home by using the mischka in a neutral colour scheme full of tans, taupes, and creams, gently accented by woods of all colours; this subtle, sophisticated look will work beautifully in a lounge, den, or dining room.

products.title: Roma Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

products.title: Roma Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma Monza - Vertical Blind
products.description: An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room.

products.title: Roma Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Roma Bronco - Vertical Blind
products.description: For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

products.title: Richmond Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails. Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art.

products.title: Roma Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind
products.description: A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic.

products.title: Roma Natural - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.title: Rochester Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The clean white of the cameo, from the arch-patterned rochester range, will work in almost any setting. The heavy curves of the patterning are streamlined and fresh, working wonderfully with the straight lines of the vertically hanging louvres. Use the cameo to add soft texture to an all-white kitchen, plumping for sleek, contemporary white units and glossy tiles. Include furniture in light to medium woods, or even modern whites, and choose silver for the fixtures, fittings, and oddments.

products.title: Rochester Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

products.title: Roma Gallery - Vertical Blind
products.description: Calm and collected, the roma gallery's pale cream hue will set off bolder colours with ease, making it both a pretty and useful window feature. The pale colour shows off the supple, cotton-like fabric that is finely woven yet highly durable. Construct a serene, peaceful environment by using the gallery as the key colour rather than a complementary one, and place against matching cream walls and soft furnishings, with light woods working effectively as an accent; a look that will work beautifully in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Henderson Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The antique-style stripes of the henderson are this time in the soothing off-white of the cameo, with alternate stitching patterns forming the striping pattern, which complements the clean lines of the modern louvres. Choose the cameo as part of the nursery, where the sweet stripes will add interest to the room without complicating the decor. Match with a soft lemon yellow for a soothing palette to encourage calm and tranquility, whilst still giving off a happy and cheery vibe.

products.title: Henderson Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

products.title: Vista Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Vista Squirrel Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista squirrel grey brings a light, industrial tone to any room, and with this blind, you can experience light and air whether it's opened or closed. Sturdy aluminium slats are home to perforated holes that let the light flow through whether opened or closed. For a cool, utilitarian look in the kitchen, team the squirrel grey with white tiles and silver accent colours. Or use in the home office for a fresh and airy feel that will soon have you knuckling down to some work.

products.title: Vista Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista venetian blind in brushed silver combines sturdy pragmatism with a muted, industrial silver, with perforated holes allowing light to gently filter through. The blind is made from heavy gauge aluminium, making it durable and hardwearing. Team the brushed silver with dark burgundy for a moody, contemporary feel in a modern living room, or use in the hallway or landing to add depth and texture to a fairly neutral area.

products.title: Vista Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through. Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers.

products.title: Vista Black - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista in black unites a jet black shade with finely perforated aluminium slats, creating a uniquely stylish, satin-finish veneer that lets the light filter through even when closed. To add more light to the room, simply use the pull-cords to tilt or open the slats. Black, of course, matches most shades, and the black will look particularly striking against bold or pastel colours, such as citrus oranges and vibrant reds, or baby blues and pretty pale pinks.

products.title: Decor Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: For graceful style with captivating decoration, choose the dcor in cameo where textured fibres fuse to produce an elegant creamy blind with distinctive, crescent detailing and compelling texture. This exquisite cloth sits on separate, tilting slats that allow you to control the amount of ventilation and light infiltrating the room. For a classy dining area with striking features, combine the cameo with shimmering table runners and silky serviettes.

products.title: Decor Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.

products.title: Wow Factor Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Wood Effect Provincial - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and natural, the wood effect's provincial is a must-have for cool sophistication. Made from a wood-effect, heavy gauge aluminium, and formed into slim slats that can be easily adjusted, this blind is both a practical and a stylish choice. Design a light, airy, and natural-feel living room by teaming the provincial with soft creams, dark browns, and matching woods. Simple dcor is all that's required to support the provincial, as its lovely natural feel needs no excess, wherever it's placed.

products.title: Wow Factor Dark Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in dark star unites charcoal grey with a pretty, shimmering silver, on heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easily adjustable to change the light content of the room. These unique features make this blind an obvious choice when choosing a stylish venetian blind. Using the dark star in a teenager's bedroom will provide grown-up style, with the glistening dark silver showing attitude and fun.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Make your home feel like the penthouse with the ecowood deluxe in penthouse satin, a faux wood venetian blind offering sleek, wide slats, backed with designer ladder tapes, as well as bags of style. The penthouse satin will team up well with rich teal tones, making the perfect pairing for a bright and cheery bathroom colour scheme. Go for classic white tiles and suite, painting a feature wall in teal and accenting with matching accessories.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Saddle Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Saddle satin deluxe allows you to take your decor in a new direction whilst staying true to the calm and neutral canvas that you've created for your chosen space. By sitting gently in your window it allows you to celebrate the shimmer of the light as it makes its way into your home. Turn the guest bedroom into the homely space that your family can make their own when they come to visit for the holidays.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta rock is a blackout blind that proves once and for all that style and substance can work together in perfect harmony. The neutral grey combines with an electric pattern that catches the light in a thousand different ways depending on which way you look at it. Now that you've found your dream blinds you can get busy reimagining the rest of your interiors. The floors and walls are natural places to start as they frame your window spaces and help connect them to the rest of your room.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: Include the sophisticated roma (fr) in almond within your home or commercial surrounding as an elegant addition with beneficial, practical elements. The modern rolling mechanism with its simple pull-cord creates a contemporary look, and the blind is formed with flame-retardant fabric to suit any surrounding. Forge a soothing and serene space by hanging the almond with a blend of neutral and wholesome tones, such as biscuit, ivory, and mocha.

products.title: Marble Fresco - Roller Blind
products.description: Flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern that shines through into the foreground. The interesting thing about fresco is that it enables you to add a calming influence to your room, but still leaves you with plenty of scope to introduce lighter colours.

products.title: Deanna Cool Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The cool grey deanna is best described as a natural stone grey that yields an appealing and calming finish. The colour is beautifully complemented by the distinctive free-flowing nature of the deanna patterning. Cool grey works well in a wide range of colour schemes. Place in a monochrome bathroom amongst white enamel and light-toned tiling, or with deep reds or burnt oranges for a modern living or dining room.

products.title: Affinity Plaster - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity blind in plaster offers a fresh take on cream, infused with just a hint of buttery yellow to give this blind a richer tone without being overpowering or overtly gold. The affinity patterning adds that touch of chic class that you have been looking for. The subtle glowing quality of the affinity plaster make this blind an ideal addition to a decadent yet tasteful bedroom or living room, where it couples well with traditional wooden features.

products.title: Clarity Urban - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in the sight that is clarity urban you instantly come up with ideas for your new home interiors projects. It's a lightweight fabric that's designed to moved gently in the breeze so that you can stay cool when the sun is shining. Match to the urban-inspired grey and you'll have the contemporary space you've always wanted. We love the idea of working in some sandy beiges so that you can find a natural colour match that will allow you to rest and relax.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Affinity Storm - Roller Blind
products.description: The lightweight, easy-to-use affinity storm is comprised of a dark grey backdrop fabric covered with a high quality, stitched pattern that reduces the light coming in from outdoors without having the full influence of a blackout blind. The way that the pattern is stitched allows the affinity storm to gently shine, giving it a modern and chic quality. Try contrasting with dark blues or purples in the living room to provide a rich, opulent colour scheme, or use the affinity patterning to provide character in a much more colour-neutral hallway or landing.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: The simple yet elegant roma (fr) in snow forms a graceful look with its delicate and pliable cloth, which also holds a quality, flame-retardant benefit. This agile fabric produces a sophisticated feel with its simple rolling mechanism, and in a soothing and versatile white shade. Frame the alluring snow with a contrasting coral or plum shade, to both accent the striking white of the blind and create a distinctive colour scheme for the remaining dcor.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bold and contemporary roma (fr) in ebony within a modern or commercial surrounding for a touch of brooding colour with distinctive character. This elegant and nimble blind holds beneficial, practical qualities, with its simple rolling mechanism and flame-retardant fabric. Combine the ebony with a distinctive blend of fuschia and teal fabrics, forming a contemporary palette with bright and alluring colours.
